Articles.Content:
I send my Hill army to destroy the planet of your bunker

My empire and army of hills on Pluto

I evacuated at the last minute and take pluto by force.

My hills.

I summon SQUAD.

Pluto is destroyed, and is now Eeloo.

My hills on Eeloo.

/tp everyone eeloo

Muhahahaha!
Recoding KSP into Minecraft commands... /fill ... tnt replace... And... BOOOM!!! Everything's gone... And now just use the same command to make my own hill... AND DONE!! I RULE!!!
I ask to join you one your hill or to alteast make a little hobbit hole in your hill. My liege.

I`m baaaaaack!

My hill

I take the hill by using my MLG loominati powers.

My MLG dank hill.

I use Shia LeBeouf.

My hill empire on Eve. Note: Personal army as well, filled with multiple Krakens.

I make a kraken-proof ship filled with depressed robots.

My hill

I send the rest of my army to destroy your ship.

My hill empire on eve guarded by an army.

I 360 noscope you and your army.

My MLG hill.

I make a hole. my hole.

I'm now king of the hole.
Umm. I travel to an alternate universe and leave everyone in the original. My hill in the alternate universe.

I fill my hole with flies and keep piling them on until it's a hill that I am the lord of. I am now lord of the flies. You all go crazy and kill each other, as well as all becoming twelve year old boys stranded on an island in the middle of a nuclear war in the 50's.

I set your flies on fire.

My hole.

I summon a mole army that kills you and makes your hole into a mole colony.

My mole colony and tunnels.

I kill the moles.

My empty colony and tunnels

I use not-banned-by-the-Keneva-convention brand poison gas to flush you out.

My infected tunnels.

I 1440noscopehardcoteMLGblaze everyone with the remains of my army.

My democratic society of Hills on Laythe. Peacekeeper army included.
It turns out no ones destroyed my hill yet in my alternate universe... And for that matter Kerbol just went supernova.

I request to join your civilization and will protect it with a navy and make it so we can be peacefull for ever and also all poison gas is banned by the keneva convention. you don't survive gas. You just linger in misery. That was a misquote of captain mathew patrick reddy.
I want, but I don't need... I use the power of electronuclear gravitational force to disassemble the atoms in your navy.

I destroy RA3236 for the sake of keeping peace. For that matter, Jool WAS flung far away, and Tylo crashed into it. The additional mass provided us a new Kerbol for Laythe.

My democratic hill society with peacekeeper army.

> 
> I destroy RA3236 for the sake of keeping peace.

Wow... Ok... Shocked... \*falls unconscious on the keyboard\*\*head presses Ctl+Z\* Peace restored while I'm still in the alternate universe.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> For that matter, Jool WAS flung far away, and Tylo crashed into it. The additional mass provided us a new Kerbol for Laythe.
> My democratic hill society with peacekeeper army.

Sorry to be rude, but Laythe was shot out of the Joolian system by the supernova and is now a cold desert wasteland...

- - - Updated - - -

And what happened to the Kerbals?

- - - Updated - - -

Oh wait that was undone oops...
